articles.title: The Indiana Pacers and Oklahoma City Thunder will meet in the NBA Finals - NPR
articles.description: It would be the first NBA title for either of the two energetic fan bases and their exciting young teams. The Thunder, led by newly minted league MVP Shai Gilgeous-Alexander, is the early favorite.
articles.content: Oklahoma City Thunder fans have waited for an NBA title since their team arrived in town in 2008. For fans of the Indiana Pacers, who joined the NBA way back in 1976, the wait for a championship has … [+3127 chars]
